thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Isa Mohammed

author: Isa Mohammed
title: Isa Mohammed
text: I bought an item on eBay and sent it to my us for them to ship to the uk. I have them the declared value I waited 2 days and then they closed my account. They refused to tell me how they returned the package to the eBay seller. I need that package I paid good money for it. I opened a case 3 days ago they said it would take 2 days max. But they never replied. Use another service AVOID!!! this shipping service at all costs.
